issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Launch KitchenSink
2. Run Base UI > Views > Events Propagation
3. Rotate the phone to landscape
4. Continue to click on "D"

Actual:
You will see "Window: You clicked on undefined"

Expected:
To return the clicked value everytime

Note:
Also happens on portrait, but easier to reproduce on landscape

Tested on:
Nexus S 2.3.2
Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (Apr 12 2011 15:24 rcc9dd9e1) and reproducible in 1.6.1

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Tapping on the Window displays: you clicked on undefined

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
